greeting.se_osb_xsb_not_found:
Welcome to Advanced Chat by Degranon!

It requires the StarExtensions version 1.9.24+, OpenStarbound 0.1.8+ or xStarbound v3.4.5.1+
https://github.com/StarExtensions/StarExtensions
https://github.com/OpenStarbound/OpenStarbound
https://github.com/xStarbound/xStarbound
greeting.se_version:
Welcome to Advanced Chat by Degranon!

Please update the StarExtensions to version 1.9.24+
greeting.osb_xsb_version:
Welcome to Advanced Chat by Degranon!

Please update OpenStarbound to version 0.1.8+ or xStarbound to v3.4.5.1+
https://github.com/OpenStarbound/OpenStarbound
https://github.com/xStarbound/xStarbound
greeting.unbind_controls:
Welcome to Advanced Chat by Degranon!

To begin with, you need to manually unbound the following controls (Press Escape - Options - Controls - Game):

* Begin Chat Command
* Begin Chat
* Repeat Last Command ^gray;(for that use /binds - Repeat last command)^reset;

Click Accept, rejoin the game - and you should be good to go!
greeting.unknown:
Welcome to Advanced Chat by Degranon!

Something went wrong. Oops!
settings.title: Chat settings
settings.subtitle: Custom chat by Degranon
commands.general.admin: Enables or disables admin mode, which enables all crafting recipes, prevents damage or energy loss, and allows access to admin-only commands.
commands.general.help: Use /help commandName to get detailed documentation.
commands.general.naked: Remove all gear. Useful in macros to give a character new gear replacing the existing gear, or you know, for fun.
commands.general.played: Displays the total play time of the current character.
commands.general.pvp: Enable or disable your Player vs. Player mode.
commands.general.reload: Reloads your local, client side assets. Will cause lag as they are reparsed.
commands.general.serverwhoami: Display your server username and admin status.
commands.general.suicide: Kills the current character, incurring all normal death penalties (including permadeath!). This can be used as a last resort.
commands.general.whereami: Displays the current coordinates of the player.
commands.general.w: Send a private message to another player.
commands.admin.ban: Bans a player from the server.
commands.admin.kick: Kicks a player from the server.
commands.admin.placedungeon: Places a dungeon at the specified coordinates.
commands.admin.whereis: Displays the coordinates of a specified player.
commands.starextentions.render: Renders various parts of the character and copies it to clipboard.
commands.openstarbound.render: Renders various parts of the character and saves it in the storage folder.
